name: renamer
description: Rename files on your PC. Built mainly using Node.js & Express.

scripts.refresh:node_modules: rm -fr node_modules && npm i && npm audit && npm audit fix
scripts.pre-release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: npm run pre-release && echo "\x1b[97m\x1b[100mNo platform to release on.\x1b[0m"
